::Dion::

Dion follows Repungus, his energy constantly being drained. His systems were fighting to produce enough to keep at equilibbrium, but he needed some more energon for that to happen.

"Allright. Lets hope its the Decepticons doing this so we get some battle," he says to Repungus, hefting his large rifle.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> Crotale looks at Pacifix as he huggs him.  "Get off me... save your 
> energy.  If you haven't noticed there something is not right.  Now as 
> commander you must fix it.  Now, what do you wish me to do Pacifix."
> He said holding two large space  mortars in his hand.
> 
> JetV ran back to the storage bay.  "All right everyone.  I need you 
> to all take defensive positions.  Technobots, you handle outer 
> weapons. You Dion, and...ummm Repugnus, cover the starboard portal.  
> Dinobots, Grimlock, by PAcifix command you must be ready to go into 
> space to fight." he winced afraid of the reaction. "And finally 
> Crossroads, find to others to cover the port airlocks to the outers. 
> Everyone understand?"
> 
> "Artemis, you stay with me, we will moniter" he said quietly to 
> ARtemis.
> 
> Repugnus stood, taking his orders began to walk to the starboard 
> entrance. "Lets do this Dion."
> 
> Slag looked to Grimlock. "We take orders Grimlock?" he said.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Dion::
> > 
> > Remembering where he was heading before the encounter with Grimlock,
> > Dion turns a corner, heading once again toward the storage rooms. He
> > felt his energy contine to be drained, but he still had alot of it 
> to
> > spare.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > --- Crossroads ---
> > >
> > > Crossroads drags himself out of his quarters, and into the storage
> > > room. He looks at the gathering bots, and feels the energy 
> draining
> > > effects increasing slowly... "What's going on?!" He says not
> > > comprehending what is happeneing.
